news.title: Cannabis stocks surge on reports Trump will reclassify marijuana; Tilray jumps 33%
news.summary: President Donald Trump will significantly ease federal restrictions on marijuana, according to the Washington Post. The move is expected to come as early as next week, the Post reports.

news.title: ‘The next protein’: Fiber is shaping up to be the latest grocery obsession
news.summary: Food and beverage companies are racing to keep up with the trend. As consumers find their next grocery obsession in fiber, food and drink companies are race to catch up.

news.title: House passes INVEST Act to ease investment standards and boost capital in markets
news.summary: "We make it easier to be a public company in America," House Financial Services Chairman French Hill, an Arkansas Republican, said during debate on the bill.

news.title: High-end Swiss chocolatier Läderach rules out U.S. production despite tariff shock
news.summary: The chocolate maker makes its products exclusively in its home country. "Consumers want Swiss chocolates to be made in Switzerland," the company says.

news.title: AI shopping could drive $263 billion in holiday sales. Walmart and Target are racing to get in
news.summary: AI chatbots could drive billions in sales this holiday season. Consumers are turning to AI chatbots like ChatGPT for gift discovery, reviews and price matching.

news.title: Costco’s profits rise as pizzas, pies and Black Friday see record sales
news.summary: . Costco shows investors a mixed financial snapshot on Thursday. Costco is the largest U.S. warehouse chain, with more than 1,000 stores.

news.title: Bezos and Musk target AI through space. These Earthly stocks could benefit.
news.summary: The investing edge is spotting where capital for orbital AI goes first, says Matthew Tuttle. Tuttle is the founder of a start-up company that develops artificial intelligence.

news.title: America needs to get tough on technology — not make Nvidia chip deals with China
news.summary: A “chip-for-chip” tariff could be a $230 billion revenue windfall. Chip-import dependence is a national-security threat.

news.title: Lululemon’s ousting of CEO draws praise from activist founder Chip Wilson
news.summary: Yoga-apparel retailer’s CEO joins the ranks of departing retail executives after tumultuous year. Yoga- Apparel CEO joins ranks of exiting retail execs after rocky year.

news.title: Investors fear Time just jinxed the AI stock-market rally with its 2025 person of the year
news.summary: CNN.com will feature iReporter photos in a weekly Travel Snapshots gallery. Visit CNN.com/Travel each week for a new gallery of snapshots from around the world.
